description:
# DEPRECATED switch to `furo-ui5-select`

The furo-ui5-collection-dropdown component represents a drop-down list. The items inside define the available
options by using the furo-ui5-collection-dropdown component.

Keyboard Handling
The furo-ui5-collection-dropdown provides advanced keyboard handling. If the furo-ui5-collection-dropdown
is focused, you can open or close the drop-down by pressing F4, ALT+UP or ALT+DOWN keys. Once the drop-down is
opened, you can use the UP and DOWN arrow keys to navigate through the available options and select one
by pressing the Space or Enter keys.

### auto-select-first
set this attribute to auto select the first item in the list, if no item is set in the bounded fieldNode.
name: FuroUi5CollectionDropdown

members.name: _initBinder
members.description:
inits the universalFieldNodeBinder.
Set the mapped attributes and labels.

members.name: addItems
members.description: Adds the option components to the default slot

members.name: bindData
members.description:
Bind a entity field to the range-input. You can use the entity even when no data was received.
When you use `@-object-ready` from a `furo-data-object` which emits a EntityNode, just bind the field with `--entity(*.fields.fieldname)`

members.name: setValue
members.description: Sets the value for the field. This will update the fieldNode.

members.name: _buildListWithMetaOptions

parameters.description: of options with id and display_name
parameters.name: list

members.description: Build the dropdown list with given options from meta

members.name: injectEntities
members.description: Inject the array of a collection

members.name: subField
members.description:
If you inject an array with complex objects, declare here the path where display_name and value_field are located.

This is only needed if display_name and value_field are not located in the root of the object.

members.name: displayField
members.description: The name of the field from the injected collection that contains the label for the dropdown array.

members.name: valueField
members.description:
declare here the name of the field from the injected collection.  by selecting an item from dropdown the defined
valueSubField of bounded complex type or the value by scalar type will be updated according to the value of this field.

members.name: valueSubField
members.description:
if you bind a complex type, you must declare here the field which gets updated of value by selecting an item. e.g. value-sub-field = "id"

If you bind a scalar, you dont need this attribute.

members.name: displaySubField
members.description:
if you bind a complex type, declare here the field which gets updated of display_name by selecting an item.

If you bind a scalar, you dont need this attribute.

members.name: autoSelectFirst
members.description: set this attribute to autoSelectFirst the first item in the list, if no item is set in the bounded fieldNode

members.name: _pseudoDropdownList
members.description: generated one element dropdown, which has only the data of the bounded DO

members.name: _injectedDropdownList
members.description: injected dropdown elements which from a collection of response or in spec defined options

type.text: {*} the original injected data (e.g. entity with link) of the selected item

events.description: Fired when the item of dropdown list is selected. **bubbles**
events.name: item-selected
